item.title: goignore
item.description: An extremely simple go CLI to hit the gitignore API with whatever you pass as command line arguments. The list of things you can pass here are documented on gitignore.io. Source Code: https://github.com/FollowTheProcess/goignore You’ll get back a .gitignore file saved to $CWD/.gitignore with the contents generated from the API. Installation go install github.com/FollowTheProcess/goignore@latest Usage Inside the folder you want the .gitignore to live in, run: goignore macos visualstudiocode go This will get you a .
